directions: Place 1 cup blackberries, strawberries, banana, orange juice, and ice into a blender in that order, and blend on high speed until smooth, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses and top each serving with 3 blackberries for garnish.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh blackberries, or more to taste
1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste  (Optional)
title: 4th of July Blast Smoothie
